strapiPost.title: Eat Your Way Through NWA During National Breakfast Month
strapiPost.content:
February is National Hot Breakfast Month, and we're happy to share our guide to Northwest Arkansas's go-to brunch spots! How many do you think you can try before the end of the month?

  • Classic diners: If you're looking for a classic diner vibe, look no further. We'd recommend Susan's in Springdale, Rick's Iron Skillet in Fayetteville, or Wesner's Grill in Rogers. Another favorite, not listed in the guide, is Neal's Cafe in Springdale. Bright hot pink walls filled with taxidermy. What's better than that?
  • Boujee breakfast: Want something a little fancier? Try Hail Fellow Well Met in Johnson, Mocking Bird Kitchen in Fayetteville, Mirabella's Table in Rogers, or The Hive in Bentonville.

Find other diners, restaurants, food trucks, and bakeries in our guide HERE.
